snippet: Arturo Gatti, who is best remembered for his three bloody fights against Mickey Ward, heads the latest class to be inducted into the International Boxing Hall of Fame.
abstract: Former world boxing champion Arturo Gatti, who killed himself in Brazil in 2009, heads the latest class to be inducted into the International Boxing Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: Arturo Gatti, who is best remembered for his three bloody fights against Mickey Ward, heads the latest class to be inducted into the International Boxing Hall of Fame.

headline.seo: Arturo Gatti Leads Boxing Hall of Fame Class
headline.main: Arturo Gatti Leads Boxing Hall of Fame Class
